company_name: EXPRO - Ministry of Human Resource and Social Development VRO
policy_holder: Ministry of Human Resource and Social Development VRO

coverage_details.organ_transplant: Not specified, but donor surgery covered up to SR 50,000
coverage_details.dental_general: SR 5,000.00, Nil deductible, Crown & bridges covered up to dental limit, Pins and Posts covered, Scaling once per year
coverage_details.maternity: SR 15,000.00 (Anti-natal and NVD), Complications up to annual limit. Not covered for parents.
coverage_details.optical: SR 2,000.00, Frame and contact lenses covered up to limit, Nil deductible
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Follows the Standard Pre-authorisation Protocol, Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Pre-existing and existing chronic conditions are covered with medications. All joint replacement surgeries up to SR 50,000. Local ambulance covered. Allergy related tests and treatments covered. Intensive care unit and home healthcare covered. Family Planning: Cost of birth control for females covered up to SR 1,500. Home Healthcare (including post-surgery wound dressing, urinary catheter, IV fluids) and telemedicine are covered. International SOS: Emergency patient transport to KSA hospitals from abroad. Coverage for blood glucose sensors per MOH recommendations. Nutritional supplements and vitamins covered if prescribed and essential. Obesity medication (Liraglutide) covered if BMI >40 or >35 with comorbidities. Obesity surgery covers extensive list of bariatric procedures. Maternity services extend to vaccinations for children up to 6 years, RSV vaccine, and milk up to 24 months as per medical need. Rehabilitation and artificial limbs up to 100,000 SAR. Autism up to 50,000 SAR. Alzheimer up to 15,000 SAR. STD coverage not specified in general table, but covered in detailed special instructions (including multiple named infections as per CHI).

coverage_details.std: Not Covered (see also detailed coverage in special instructions)
coverage_details.birth_control: Not Covered in Table (covered up to SR 1,500 under special instructions)
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Not specified, but donor surgery covered up to SR 50,000
coverage_details.dental_general: SR 5,000.00, 20% up to SR 100 deductible, Crown & bridges covered up to dental limit, Pins and Posts covered, Scaling once per year
coverage_details.maternity: SR 15,000.00 (Anti-natal and NVD), Complications up to annual limit. Not covered for parents.
coverage_details.optical: SR 2,000.00, Frame and contact lenses covered up to limit, Deductible applies
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Follows the Standard Pre-authorisation Protocol, Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Similar to VVIP with the exception of a single room instead of a suite and deductible applies for outpatient and other services. Coverage for pre-existing and chronic conditions, joint replacements, home healthcare, ambulance, rehabilitation/artificial limbs, autism, Alzheimer, multiple STD infections as per CHI. Obesity and obesity medications up to 20,000 SAR for BMI criteria. Optical limit SR 2,000 with deductible. Birth control covered up to SR 1,500. Telemedicine and international patient transfer included.

coverage_details.maternity: SR 15,000.00 (Anti-natal and NVD), Complications up to annual limit. Not covered for parents.
coverage_details.optical: SR 2,000.00, Frame and contact lenses covered up to limit
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Follows the Standard Pre-authorisation Protocol. Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Covers pre-existing and chronic diseases, acute illnesses up to annual limit, psychiatric, dialysis, joint replacements, artificial limbs and rehabilitation, autism, Alzheimer, ambulance, ICU, home health, telemedicine, International SOS evacuations. Vaccinations, maternity complications, congenital, STD, birth control and obesity coverage as for other VIP variants where not otherwise excluded.

coverage_details.optical: SR 2,000.00, Frame and contact lenses covered up to limit
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Follows the Standard Pre-authorisation Protocol. Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Covers pre-existing and chronic diseases, acute illnesses up to annual limit, psychiatric, dialysis, joint replacements, artificial limbs and rehabilitation, autism, Alzheimer, ambulance, ICU, home health, telemedicine, International SOS evacuations. Vaccinations, maternity complications, congenital, birth control and obesity coverage as for other VIP variants where not otherwise excluded. Maternity limit increased to 25,000 SAR.
